Compliance & Governance

Built for Regulated Industries

Our curriculum aligns with critical frameworks for financial services and enterprise compliance

Evidence Kit for Audit Readiness

Sample syllabi, assessment rubrics, attendance reporting, and compliance mapping documentation

100%
Programs mapped to relevant standards
4
Critical frameworks covered
50+
Control families addressed
Insurance

Model Governance at Scale

CHALLENGE

A large insurance carrier struggled to operationalize 40+ AI models across underwriting, claims, and fraud detection, facing regulatory scrutiny and inconsistent validation practices.

SOLUTION

Stevens designed a Model Governance practitioner cohort covering NIST AI RMF, SR 11-7 compliance, bias testing, and audit-ready documentation. 25 model risk analysts and data scientists completed the program.

OUTCOMES
↓ 67%
Model Audit Findings
↓ 40%
Validation Cycle Time
0
Bias Incidents
↑ High
Regulatory Confidence

""The Stevens program gave our team a common language and framework. We moved from reactive compliance to proactive governance.""

— Chief Model Risk Officer

Financial Services

DevSecOps Transformation

CHALLENGE

A fintech firm faced 6-week security review bottlenecks, manual compliance checks, and delayed product launches while migrating to cloud infrastructure.

SOLUTION

Stevens delivered a private DevSecOps cohort (30 engineers) covering secure CI/CD, IaC scanning, secrets management, and NIST CSF controls. Included hands-on labs with Terraform, GitHub Actions, and AWS security tools.

OUTCOMES
↓ 85%
Security Review Time
↓ 73%
Critical Vulnerabilities
↑ 4x
Deploy Frequency
0
Failed Audits

""We shifted security left without sacrificing velocity. Stevens helped us automate what used to take weeks.""

— VP Engineering

Banking

SRE Capability Build

CHALLENGE

A regional bank struggled with frequent outages (MTTR 4+ hours), unclear ownership, and no formal incident process as they scaled digital banking services.

SOLUTION

Stevens designed a 12-week SRE program for 20 engineers covering SLI/SLO design, incident management, observability, and reliability economics. Paired with platform engineering fundamentals.

OUTCOMES
↓ 78%
MTTR
↓ 62%
Unplanned Outages
99.9%
SLO Compliance
↓ 54%
On-Call Burnout

""The SRE discipline transformed our culture. We now manage reliability like a product.""

— Head of Platform Engineering
